npcDialogues.oldSalty.positiveDelivery2: Avast! Ye've brought the very treasure Old Salty desires. Ye be earnin' me respect, me hearty!
npcDialogues.oldSalty.positiveDelivery3: Ahoy, ye've found the treasure Old Salty's been huntin'. Ye be a true legend in these waters, me hearty!

npcDialogues.oldSalty.negativeDelivery2: Ah, scallywag! No treasure for Old Salty? Keep searchin', and ye'll find the riches ye seek!
npcDialogues.oldSalty.negativeDelivery3: Shiver me timbers! No treasure for Old Salty? Keep sailin', me matey. The loot be out there, waitin' fer ye!

npcDialogues.oldSalty.missingPotion2: Return when ye've the heart and body of a true pirate!

npcDialogues.oldSalty.chestOpened2: Return on the morrow to plunder the Pirate Chest once more!

npcDialogues.raven.positiveDelivery2: Marvelous! You've acquired what I sought. Together, we shall delve into the deepest depths of magic!
npcDialogues.raven.positiveDelivery3: Incredible! You've gathered the mystical components I required. Your journey in the realm of magic begins!
npcDialogues.raven.positiveDelivery4: Ah, splendid! You've obtained the elusive ingredients I sought. Your journey in the realm of magic begins!
npcDialogues.raven.negativeDelivery1: Alas, the required ingredients elude you. Fear not, though. Keep searching, and the mysteries shall reveal themselves!

npcDialogues.tywin.positiveDelivery2: Surprisingly, you've actually delivered what I desired. Perhaps you're not as useless as I presumed.
npcDialogues.tywin.positiveDelivery3: Ah, marvelous work! You've brought the materials I require. Together, we shall create masterpieces!

npcDialogues.tywin.negativeDelivery1: Pathetic. You don't have what I asked for. Don't waste my time with your incompetence. Leave!
npcDialogues.tywin.negativeDelivery2: What a disappointment. You don't have what I requested. Typical of your kind. Now begone!
npcDialogues.tywin.negativeDelivery3: Unsatisfactory. You don't possess what I require. I have no time for incompetence. Return when you're capable.
npcDialogues.tywin.negativeDelivery4: Incompetence. You lack the materials required. Don't waste my time; return when you're prepared.
npcDialogues.tywin.noOrder1: Ah, it appears I don't have an active order for you, commoner. But if you require my esteemed presence or have a request, state it quickly. Time is money, after all.
npcDialogues.tywin.noOrder2: No active order for you today, peasant. However, should you stumble upon something worthy of my attention or require my expertise, you know where to find me.

npcDialogues.bert.negativeDelivery4: Oh, not quite what I sought. Return when you have it. But keep your eyes open; the pages of history have more to reveal.

npcDialogues.cornwell.negativeDelivery4: Ah, I see you haven't found the specific items I need. Fret not; the history of Sunflower Land holds many secrets waiting to be unearthed.

npcDialogues.salty.goodFlower: Aye, this blue flower is just right! Much obliged for bringin' it to me.
npcDialogues.miranda.reward: Thank you for your efforts. Here's a small token of appreciation for your deliveries.
npcDialogues.miranda.flowerIntro: The vibrancy of a Yellow flower would surely lift my spirits. Have you seen one around?
npcDialogues.miranda.averageFlower: It's not exactly what I was hoping for, but it's quite charming. Thank you.
npcDialogues.miranda.badFlower: This flower isn't quite right. Perhaps another one would be more suitable?
npcDialogues.miranda.goodFlower: This Yellow flower is lovely! Thank you for bringing it to me.
npcDialogues.cornwell.reward: Thank you for your deliveries. Here's a small token of appreciation for your efforts.
npcDialogues.cornwell.flowerIntro: The sight of a Balloon Flower in Red, Yellow, Purple, White, or Blue is truly delightful...
npcDialogues.cornwell.averageFlower: Not quite what I was expecting, but it's quite charming. Thank you.
npcDialogues.cornwell.badFlower: This flower isn't quite right. Perhaps another search is in order?
npcDialogues.cornwell.goodFlower: This Balloon Flower is delightful! Thank you for bringing it to me.
npcDialogues.tywin.reward: Thank you for your deliveries. Here's a small token of appreciation for your efforts.
npcDialogues.tywin.flowerIntro: Have you heard of the exquisite Primula Enigma or the mesmerizing Celestial Frostbloom? I'm in need of one.
npcDialogues.tywin.averageFlower: Not exactly what I was hoping for, but it's quite delightful. Thank you.
npcDialogues.tywin.badFlower: This flower isn't quite right. Perhaps another one would be more suitable?
npcDialogues.tywin.goodFlower: This flower is simply breathtaking! Thank you for bringing it to me.
npcDialogues.default.flowerIntro: Have you got a flower for me? Make sure it is something I like.
npcDialogues.default.averageFlower: Wow, thanks! I love this flower!
npcDialogues.default.badFlower: Hmmmm, this isn't my favorite flower. But I guess it's the thought that counts.
npcDialogues.default.goodFlower: This is my favorite flower! Thanks a bunch!
npcDialogues.default.reward: Wow, thanks Bumpkin. Here is a small gift for your help!
npcDialogues.queenVictoria.intro1: Oh, it's you. Do you have my taxes ready, peasant?
npcDialogues.queenVictoria.intro2: Greetings, subject. I trust you have brought the taxes I demanded?
npcDialogues.queenVictoria.intro3: What do you want, peasant? I'm busy worrying about the throne. Have you brought my taxes?
npcDialogues.queenVictoria.intro4: Oh, the things I must tolerate. Make it quick, peasant. Did you bring my taxes?
npcDialogues.queenVictoria.intro5: The throne sits idle, and here you are. I hope you brought my taxes, peasant.
npcDialogues.queenVictoria.positiveDeliv: Finally, something done right. You've brought my taxes. Consider yourself acknowledged.
Very well, this will suffice. You've brought the taxes. You may go now.
Acceptable. You've brought my taxes. Perhaps you're not entirely useless.
Impressive, for a peasant. The taxes are in order. You may leave.
Good. You've managed to bring my taxes. The throne shall not remain empty forever.
npcDialogues.queenVictoria.negativeDeliv: What is this? You haven't brought my taxes? How utterly disappointing.
Pathetic. No taxes? How do you expect the kingdom to thrive?
Disgraceful. You come to me without the taxes. This is unacceptable.
Really? No taxes? I should have known not to expect much from peasants.
Useless! Without the taxes, how can I maintain the kingdom's wealth?
npcDialogues.queenVictoria.noOrder1: Hmph, it seems I have no tasks for you at the moment. You're free to go, but don't forget who rules here.
npcDialogues.queenVictoria.noOrder2: No active orders for now, peasant. Consider yourself lucky. Be gone.
npcDialogues.queenVictoria.reward: Very well, I suppose you deserve a token for your services. Don't expect this often.
npcDialogues.queenVictoria.flowerIntro: Have you laid eyes on the magnificent Primula Enigma? I desire one...
npcDialogues.queenVictoria.averageFlower: This is not what I envisioned, but I suppose it will do. Leave it here.
npcDialogues.queenVictoria.badFlower: This is utterly unsuitable. Find me a better one, peasant.
npcDialogues.queenVictoria.goodFlower: Ah, splendid! This Primula Enigma is precisely what I wanted. Well done, for once.
npcDialogues.gambit.intro1: Hehe, what do we have here? Ready to play a game of chance, friend?
npcDialogues.gambit.intro2: Well, well, if it isn't my favorite risk-taker! Care to place a bet?
npcDialogues.gambit.intro3: Greetings, my fellow adventurer! Shall we test our luck today?
npcDialogues.gambit.intro4: Ah, a new face! Ready to gamble your way to fortune, or perhaps misfortune?
npcDialogues.gambit.intro5: Hey there! Fancy a game of wits and chance? The stakes are high, just the way I like it.
npcDialogues.gambit.positiveDelivery1: Aha! You've come through! Seems luck is on your side today.
npcDialogues.gambit.positiveDelivery2: Well played! You've brought exactly what I needed. Fortune favors the bold!
npcDialogues.gambit.positiveDelivery3: Perfect! You've delivered just what I was hoping for. Let's see if your luck holds!
npcDialogues.gambit.positiveDelivery4: Excellent! You've got what I needed. Seems the odds were in your favor this time.
npcDialogues.gambit.positiveDelivery5: Bravo! You've brought what I asked for. Perhaps there's more fortune to be found.
npcDialogues.gambit.negativeDelivery1: Oh, tough luck! You don't have what I need. Better luck next time!
npcDialogues.gambit.negativeDelivery2: Not quite what I was hoping for. Keep trying, and maybe the odds will be in your favor.
npcDialogues.gambit.negativeDelivery3: Ah, bad luck! You don't have it. But don't give up, there's always another chance!
npcDialogues.gambit.negativeDelivery4: Close, but not quite! You don't have what I'm looking for. Try again, the game isn't over.
npcDialogues.gambit.negativeDelivery5: Oops, seems you're out of luck this time. But don't worry, keep playing and you'll win eventually.
npcDialogues.gambit.noOrder1: Looks like I don't have any bets for you right now. Come back later and we'll see what we can wager!
npcDialogues.gambit.noOrder2: No games for you today, my friend. But stick around, the stakes are always changing!
npcDialogues.jester.intro1: Ah, a new face in the court! Ready for a jest or two?
npcDialogues.jester.intro2: Greetings, friend! Fancy a laugh at the royals' expense?
npcDialogues.jester.intro3: Well, well, look whoâ€™s graced the court! Got any good jokes?
npcDialogues.jester.intro4: Hello, adventurer! Ready to hear the latest about our dear queen?
npcDialogues.jester.intro5: Ahoy! Step into the court and let's share a laugh or two about the royals.
npcDialogues.jester.positiveDelivery1: Haha! You've brought exactly what I need. You're funnier than I thought!
npcDialogues.jester.positiveDelivery2: Perfect! You've got just what I asked for. Maybe you should be the jester!
npcDialogues.jester.positiveDelivery3: Marvelous! You've delivered right on cue. The court will be delighted!
npcDialogues.jester.positiveDelivery4: Fantastic! You've brought the goods. The queen will be amused!
npcDialogues.jester.positiveDelivery5: Splendid! Just what I needed. You might have a knack for this!
npcDialogues.jester.negativeDelivery1: Oh dear, that's not what I needed. But hey, it's the thought that counts!
npcDialogues.jester.negativeDelivery2: Oops, not quite right! But don't worry, even the best jesters miss the mark sometimes.
npcDialogues.jester.negativeDelivery3: Oh no, that's not it! But don't fret, we'll laugh about this later.
npcDialogues.jester.negativeDelivery4: Haha, not what I asked for! But I appreciate the effort. Try again?
npcDialogues.jester.negativeDelivery5: Whoops, that's not what I needed. But hey, every joke has its off day!
npcDialogues.jester.noOrder1: No tasks for you right now, friend. But feel free to stick around and enjoy the court's humor!
npcDialogues.jester.noOrder2: No orders today, but don't be a stranger! The court is always lively with jesters around.
npcDialogues.jester.reward: Bravo! Hereâ€™s a little something for your trouble. Keep the laughs coming!
npcDialogues.jester.flowerIntro: Ever seen a Red Balloon Flower or a Red Carnation? They always bring a smile to my face...
npcDialogues.jester.averageFlower: Hmm, not exactly a knee-slapper, but it'll do. Thanks!
npcDialogues.jester.badFlower: Oh no, this flower is as funny as a wet sock! Try again, will you?
npcDialogues.jester.goodFlower: Splendid! This flower is perfect. Almost as good as one of my jokes!
npcDialogues.pharaoh.noOrder1: I have no specific quest for you at this moment, but the desert is vast and full of hidden relics. Keep exploring, and you may find what we seek.
npcDialogues.pharaoh.noOrder2: There is no current mission, but the sands of time conceal many treasures. Your journey is far from over, brave explorer.
npcDialogues.pharaoh.negativeDelivery1: Alas, no relics this time. Do not despair, for the sands still hide many secrets waiting to be unearthed.
npcDialogues.pharaoh.negativeDelivery2: No artifacts today? The journey of discovery is long, but perseverance will lead us to our goal.
npcDialogues.pharaoh.negativeDelivery3: The ancients' secrets remain hidden for now. Continue your search, and you shall find the treasures we seek.
npcDialogues.pharaoh.positiveDelivery1: Ah, you have found a relic of the ancients. Your efforts bring us closer to unraveling the mysteries of the past.
npcDialogues.pharaoh.positiveDelivery2: Behold, a treasure from a bygone era. Your discovery is invaluable to my quest for lost knowledge.
npcDialogues.pharaoh.positiveDelivery3: This artifact is a key to our forgotten history. Your contribution is greatly appreciated, noble traveler.
npcDialogues.pharaoh.intro1: Greetings, traveler. I am the Pharaoh, seeker of lost relics and forgotten knowledge. Have you uncovered any ancient treasures?
npcDialogues.pharaoh.intro2: Welcome, wanderer. The sands of time hold many secrets, and I am in search of them. Have you found any artifacts on your journey?
npcDialogues.pharaoh.intro3: Hail, explorer. I am the Pharaoh, guardian of ancient secrets. Have you discovered any relics that might aid in solving the mysteries of our past?
plaza.magicButton.query: A magical button has appeared in the plaza. Do you want to press it?
nyonStatue.description: The legendary knight responsible for clearing the goblins from the mines. Shortly after his victory he died by poisoning from a Goblin conspirator. The Sunflower Citizens erected this statue with his armor to commemorate his conquests.

onboarding.buyFarm.two: This NFT will securely store all your progress in Sunflower Land and allow you to keep coming back to tend to your farm.

statements.auctioneer.one: I've travelled far and wide across Sunflower Land in search for exotic treasures to bring to my fellow Bumpkins.
statements.auctioneer.two: Don't miss one of the Auctions where a swing of my mighty hammer can turn your hard-earned resources into rare, minted marvels!

statements.beta.two: Stay tuned for updates. We will be going live soon!
statements.blacklist.one: The anti-bot and multi-account detection system has picked up strange behaviour. Actions have been restricted.

statements.clock.one: Uh oh, it looks like your clock is not in sync with the game. Set date and time to automatic to avoid disruptions
statements.cooldown: To protect the community, we require a 2 week waiting period before this farm can be accessed.
statements.guide.two: Check out this guide to help you get started.
statements.jigger.one: You will be redirected to a 3rd party service to take a quick selfie. Never share any personal information or crypto data.
statements.jigger.two: You failed the Jigger Proof of Humanity.
statements.jigger.three: You can continue playing, but some actions will be restricted while you are being verified.
statements.jigger.four: Please reach out to support@usejigger.com if you beleive this was a mistake.
statements.jigger.five: Your proof of humanity is still being processed by Jigger. This can take up to 2 hours.
statements.jigger.six: The multi-account detection system has picked up strange behaviour.

statements.potionRule.one: Objective: Figure out the combination. You have 3 tries to get it right. The game will end if you have a perfect potion or if you run out of tries.
statements.potionRule.two: Choose a combination of potions and attempt to mix them.
statements.potionRule.three: Adjust your next combination based on the feedback given.
statements.potionRule.four: When the game is complete, the score for your last attempt will determine your reward.
statements.potionRule.five: A perfect potion in the perfect position

statements.sflLim.two: You can continue playing, but will need to wait until tomorrow to sync again.

statements.tutorial.two: Many lands are far away and will require an experienced Bumpkin before you can visit them.
statements.tutorial.three: Your adventure begins now, how far you explore ... that is on you.

removeCropMachine.title: Remove Crop Machine?
removeCropMachine.description: This action will remove all the oil stored in your crop machine.
easterEgg.knight: Hellllllp...Don't trust the Gambit or his dirty tricks!
easterEgg.kingdomBook1: Dear Diary, I fear the king may never return. Whispers in the court suggest someone may seize the throne in his absence. This kingdom teeters on a knife's edge.
easterEgg.kingdomBook2: Tywin is too weak and far too soft on the Bumpkins. They need to pay more taxes. This kingdom needs a firm hand, not his gentle touch.
easterEgg.kingdomBook3: The royals are a cruel bunch. They treat everyone like dirt beneath their feet. No wonder no one likes them! At least they give me plenty of material for my jokes.
easterEgg.kingdomBook4: Authority and respect are crucial to suppressing the Goblins. We didnâ€™t endure the war only to hand them power. They must be kept in their place for our kingdom's safety.
easterEgg.kingdomBook5: To be king, I must be extra cruel. Once I ascend the throne, all Goblins will suffer. Their rebellion ends with me, and our kingdom will be stronger for it.
easterEgg.desertBook1: Camels are a sacred animal, rumoured to transport rare artefacts. They say not all arrived at their destination and their remains are scattered throughout the site.
easterEgg.desertBook2: The desert reveals layers of history. Each desert storm brings us closer to the past.
easterEgg.desertBook3: An ancient secret is revealed in the desert, deciphered by the language of my ancestors.
easterEgg.desertBook4: I've crossed the seas from Treasure Island to find this bountiful land....and all for what? Some lousy relics!

easterEgg.halloweenBookText: There are places older than time itself, and others where the light doesn't shine. You shouldn't be here. In this forest, the trees whisper secrets of forgotten times and shadows lurk everywhere, patiently waiting for a chance to devour any source of light that dares to shine. There's no place for adventurers or the curious like you around here...
halloween.portal.title: Minigame - Halloween
halloween.portal.description: Can you conquer the dungeon and its relics?
halloween.portal.rewardMessage: Congratulations, you completed the mission! Here is your reward.
halloween.sacrifice.intro.one: They say that on a moonless night, beneath the ancient trees, a witch gathered the most varied and powerful spirits of the earth.
halloween.sacrifice.intro.two: Each held a different echo, a unique glimmer in their gaze, and each was offered to the sacred circle under an ancient oath.
halloween.sacrifice.intro.three: When all spirits were present, the forest trembled, and in a flash of green and gold, a powerful creature was born, infused with the strength and wisdom of those who were summoned.
halloween.sacrifice.intro.four: Only one who understands the mysteries of each spirit and brings them together in perfect harmony shall be worthy of this blessingâ€¦ but beware, for such power is not given to just anyone.
halloween.sacrifice.suggestion: Remember to choose carefully which bears you want to sacrifice.
halloween.sacrifice.empty: You don't have any bears to sacrifice
halloween.noticeboard.two: In this event you will find a limited time Halloween Portal, where danger lurks and only the bravest bumpkins survive!
halloween.noticeboard.three: At the end of the event, special rewards will be distributed to those with the highest score in the portal!
halloween.noticeboard.four: The highest scores will receive special limited items, while those with the highest accumulated scores(sum of the best scores for each day of the event) will receive $FLOWER rewards!
halloween.noticeboard.five: You can also make donations to the NPC in this island, and a special gift will be given to those who donate 3 $POL or more!

description.autumnDuckling: Crisp leaves and cozy feathers, ready for the harvest season.
description.winterDuckling: Bundled up in downy feathers, this little one waddles through the winter wonderland with cheer.

description.summer.chicken: A sun-loving chicken that thrives in the summer heat, basking in the warm rays and clucking with joy!
description.jellyfish: A luminous marine marvel that glows with mystical energy, granting enhanced fishing abilities during the warm summer months.
description.chamomile: A decorative mutant flower found during the Winds of Change chapter.

description.frozenHeart.boost: +1 Yield to Winter Plot Crop in Winter
description.floralArch: A grand entrance made of natureâ€™s finest, welcoming all who pass through.
description.flowerCoin: A symbol of new beginnings, marking the bloom of a fresh era in Sunflower Land.
description.flowerStatue: A monument to growth and transformation, standing tall as the world of Bumpkins flourishes in a new symbol
description.heartstruckTree: Legends say Cupid himself took aim at this tree, and now it grows love instead of leaves.
description.mermaidFountain: Whisper your wishes to the waters, and let the mermaidâ€™s melody guide your heart.
description.mysteriousEntrance: Where does it lead? Only those who dare to step through will know.
description.streamersStatue: A tribute to those who amplify the community, earning rewards by sharing the stories and adventure in Sunflower Land.
description.cetus: An ancient creature of the sea, watching over the waters with silent wisdom.
description.goldcrestMosaicRug: A masterful blend of tiles, reflecting the sunâ€™s warm embrace.
description.sandyMosaicRug: A pattern woven from desert winds and sun-kissed dreams.
description.twilightRug: A deep, dark weave, capturing the beauty of the twilight and flowers.
description.orchardRug: Woven with care, just like the trees in a well-tended grove.
description.carrotRug: Perfect for a cozy farmhouse, or a rabbit with expensive taste.
description.beetrootRug: A rich, earthy hue that brings warmth to any home.
description.harlequinRug: A timeless pattern that never goes out of style.
description.largeRug: Big, bold, and built for comfort.
description.goldenFence: Sturdy and shining, a fence built to last for ages.
description.goldenStoneFence: Blending the strength of stone with a glimmer of fortune.
description.goldenPineTree: Tall and proud, standing through every season.
description.goldenTree: A rare sight in nature, glowing under the sunâ€™s rays.
description.goldenBush: A small but majestic addition to any landscape.
description.blackTile: A deep black tile that adds a touch of sophistication and contrast to any space.
description.blueTile: A cool blue tile, bringing the calm and openness of the sky to your surroundings.
description.greenTile: A fresh green tile, inspired by rolling fields and the heart of nature.

description.obsidianTurtle: Steady and silent, this ancient creature gathers traces of volcanic stone wherever it roams.
description.winterGuardian: Summoned from a land where snow never melts, this frostbound protector now watches over the skiesâ€”an honored guest in unfamiliar winds.
description.summerGuardian: A blazing figure born under endless sun, this Guardian brings the heat of its homeland to the cooler heights of Sky Island.
description.springGuardian: Awakened from fertile fields far below, this gentle spirit now nurtures life among the drifting gardens of the sky.
description.autumnGuardian: With harvest hues and a wistful gaze, this Guardian carries the essence of changing seasons from distant lands into the realm above.
description.skyPillar: These ancient columns are said to predate the sky itself, pulsing with the energy that keeps Sky Island afloat and in balance.
description.flowerscribedStatue: Carved from pale stone and etched with ancient floral verses, this statue hums with the quiet wisdom of Sunflower Land.
description.balloonRug: A soft, whimsical rug that feels lighter than airâ€”perfect for lounging in style.
description.giantYam: A root so massive it could feed a villageâ€”or at least make one impressive stew.
description.heartAirBalloon: A floating symbol of love, ready to lift spirits and hearts alike. +1 Geniseeds from deliveries, chores & bounties.
description.giantZucchini: Impossibly large and suspiciously green, this veggie is a true garden marvel.
description.miniFloatingIsland: A small-sized patch of paradise that somehow stays afloatâ€”perfect for peaceful moments.

description.longRug: A horizontally long patterned rug to warm up any floor.
description.garbageBin: A sturdy bin used for collecting trash.
description.wheelBarrow: A classic tool for moving heavy items around the farm.
description.snailKing: Royalty with a slime trailâ€”slow but majestic.
description.reelmastersChair: A folding chair equipped for serious fishing. Comes with built-in rod holders and fish tales.
description.ratKing: A tangled tale of tails and questionable leadership.
description.fruitTuneBox: Plays nothing but berry good music.
description.doubleBed: A cozy bed made for friends.
description.giantArtichoke: The heart of the gardenâ€”literally huge Artichoke.
description.rocketStatue: A rocket ready for lift-offâ€”with the whole world on its back!
description.antQueen: She rules the dirtâ€”and your crumbs.
description.jurassicDroplet: Dino doo, polished and preservedâ€”natureâ€™s weirdest relic.
description.giantOnion: Itâ€™s big. Itâ€™s bold. It will make your whole field cry.

description.groovyGramophone: Spins vintage vibes and funky beats.
description.wheatWhiskers: A bundle of wheat playfully accompanied by curious mice.
npcDialogues.pumpkinPete.chore1: Have you seen the strange objects in the sky? Keep an eye on your crops!
npcDialogues.pumpkinPete.chore2: These new animal products are bringing so many new farming possibilities!
npcDialogues.pumpkinPete.chore3: The Farmers Market is busier than ever with all these new resources!
npcDialogues.peggy.chore1: I can barely keep up with all these new recipe requests! Everyone wants to try cooking with animal products.
npcDialogues.peggy.chore2: These new cheese and egg recipes are keeping me busy in the kitchen.
npcDialogues.peggy.chore3: I hope you're not using any gems in your cooking... that would be terrible!
npcDialogues.betty.chore1: The Farmers Market has never been this busy! We're running low on wheat, corn, and barley.
npcDialogues.betty.chore2: Everyone needs animal feed these days. The demand is through the roof!
npcDialogues.betty.chore3: I'm saving every FLOWER I earn from the market for my own farm someday.
npcDialogues.miranda.chore1: Have you tried growing tomatoes? I still can't decide if they're fruits or vegetables!
npcDialogues.miranda.chore2: The sun is perfect for dancing today! Though I could do without the strange sightings in the sky...
npcDialogues.miranda.chore3: Nothing beats a sunny day at the beach, especially with all this excitement about animals!
npcDialogues.blacksmith.chore1: This crafting box launch has me worried about my business...
npcDialogues.blacksmith.chore2: Quality tools for quality work - that's what I always say.
npcDialogues.blacksmith.chore3: These new animal products better not affect the metal trade.
npcDialogues.raven.chore1: I've been having visions... of a dark sheep that could change everything in Sunflower Land.
npcDialogues.raven.chore2: The shadows whisper of strange creatures in our midst...
npcDialogues.raven.chore3: These mysterious sightings... they have a dark energy about them.
npcDialogues.cornwell.chore1: I sense a dangerous storm approaching... these are uncertain times.
npcDialogues.cornwell.chore2: The crops tell me stories of change. We must prepare for what's coming.
npcDialogues.cornwell.chore3: Keep your grain stores full - we may need them in the days ahead.
npcDialogues.finley.chore1: You won't believe what I saw in the ocean - a strange cow-like creature!
npcDialogues.finley.chore2: My brother Finn might tell tall tales, but what I saw was real.
npcDialogues.finley.chore3: The waters have been different lately, something's changing out there.
npcDialogues.gordo.chore1: Have you tried the new cheese recipes? Simply magnificent!
npcDialogues.gordo.chore2: The new spaghetti and pizza dishes are to die for!
npcDialogues.gordo.chore3: These animal products are revolutionizing our cuisine!
npcDialogues.tywin.chore1: I'm implementing a new tax on all animal products. The crown must profit!
npcDialogues.tywin.chore2: These new resources must be properly regulated and taxed.
npcDialogues.tywin.chore3: The nobility requires only the finest animal products - see to it.
npcDialogues.oldSalty.chore1: Arr, I've been collecting cow skulls from my treasure hunts. Curious findings...
npcDialogues.oldSalty.chore2: The seas be changing, and strange creatures lurk in the depths.
npcDialogues.oldSalty.chore3: These cow skulls I've been finding might be worth something someday!
npcDialogues.guria.chore1: The spirits speak of a green creature, unlike any goblin I've known...
npcDialogues.guria.chore2: My crystal ball shows strange shapes in the skies above our farms.
npcDialogues.guria.chore3: The future is clouded with mysterious creatures and great change.
npcDialogues.petro.chore1: This oil shortage is getting worse by the day!
npcDialogues.petro.chore2: We need more resources to keep the machinery running smoothly.
npcDialogues.petro.chore3: These mechanical problems won't fix themselves, bring me more oil!
npcDialogues.chase.chore1: My animals have been acting strange lately. Some have gone missing!
npcDialogues.chase.chore2: There are mysterious tracks in the fields - unlike anything I've seen before.
npcDialogues.chase.chore3: Keep your animals close, strange things are happening in these parts.
npcDialogues.birdie.chore1: The new Megastore format is absolutely fabulous! Such epic sales!
npcDialogues.birdie.chore2: Have you seen the latest seasonal fashions? Simply stunning!
npcDialogues.birdie.chore3: These new animal products are inspiring some amazing new designs!
npcDialogues.grimbly.chore1: These new animal products will make excellent crafting materials!
npcDialogues.grimbly.chore2: Bring me more resources - the forge hungers for new materials!
npcDialogues.grimbly.chore3: The animals bring new opportunities for crafting. Don't keep me waiting!
npcDialogues.garth.chore1: These animal products could revolutionize my potion making!
npcDialogues.garth.chore2: I wonder what magical properties these new ingredients possess...
npcDialogues.garth.chore3: The Sunflorians won't like my experiments with these animal products!
npcDialogues.grimtooth.chore1: Arr, these new treasures from the animals be worth their weight in gold!
npcDialogues.grimtooth.chore2: The seas be changing, and so do the spoils we can plunder!
npcDialogues.grimtooth.chore3: These animal products will fetch a fine price in the black market!
npcDialogues.finn.chore1: You won't believe the size of the cow-like creature I saw in the ocean!
npcDialogues.finn.chore2: These strange sightings are affecting the fish. They're acting peculiar!
npcDialogues.finn.chore3: I've got the biggest fishing story yet - just wait till you hear it!
npcDialogues.victoria.chore1: The kingdom demands proper regulation of these new animal resources!
npcDialogues.victoria.chore2: These mysterious sightings must be investigated. The crown commands it!
npcDialogues.victoria.chore3: Ensure all animal products meet royal standards, or face consequences!
npcDialogues.gambit.chore1: Care to wager on what creature will appear in the sky next?
npcDialogues.gambit.chore2: The odds of these strange sightings are astronomical - I love it!
npcDialogues.gambit.chore3: Place your bets on which animal will go missing next!
npcDialogues.grubnuk.chore1: These animal products are worth their weight in FLOWER! Bring me more!
npcDialogues.grubnuk.chore2: Business is booming with all these new resources to trade!
npcDialogues.grubnuk.chore3: Strange times mean profitable trades for those who know where to look!
npcDialogues.bert.chore1: These magical mushrooms might explain the strange creatures in the sky...
npcDialogues.bert.chore2: The mushrooms tell me secrets about the missing animals!
npcDialogues.bert.chore3: Reality is getting stranger by the day - just how I like it!
npcDialogues.tango.chore1: Even the animals are dancing to these strange new rhythms!
npcDialogues.tango.chore2: The mysterious sightings make for excellent dance inspiration!
npcDialogues.tango.chore3: Let's celebrate these exciting changes with a dance!
npcDialogues.timmy.chore1: Have you seen any strange bears in the forest lately? They're acting different!
npcDialogues.timmy.chore2: The honey supplies are running low with all these new animal farms!
npcDialogues.timmy.chore3: Even the bears are curious about these mysterious sky sightings!
npcDialogues.corale.chore1: The coral reefs are buzzing with news about strange sea creatures!
npcDialogues.corale.chore2: Something big is disturbing the ocean's natural balance...
npcDialogues.corale.chore3: The fish say they've seen cow-like shadows in deeper waters!
npcDialogues.santa.intro1: Ho Ho Ho Bumpkin! For a limited time, I am giving daily rewards for those that find my scattered candy.
npcDialogues.santa.intro2: Each day you will find 10 pieces scattered throughout the Pumpkin Plaza.
npcDialogues.santa.intro3: Collect the 10 candy and claim the daily prizes!
npcDialogues.santa.dialogue1: Ho ho ho! Collect my missing candy for a reward.
npcDialogues.santa.dialogue3: Well done! You have completed the 12 Days of Christmas. Don't forget to place the Festive Tree for a special gift.
npcDialogues.santa.dialogue4: Complete the challenge 12 days in a row for a special prize.
npcDialogues.santa.dialogue5: Ho Ho Ho! Well done Bumpkin, you found my candy.
npcDialogues.ginger.dialogue1: This Festive Tree is full of gifts and decorations.
npcDialogues.ginger.dialogue2: I wonder what I can receive from Santa after shaking it...
npcDialogues.elf.dialogue1: Oops, I dropped some candies around the plaza. If you find any, bring them back to Santa for a sweet reward!
description.trade.points: Earned from trading collectibles and wearables in the marketplace. Can be exchanged for in-game rewards.
marketplace.welcomeDescription: Explore the latest items & trade with other players to build your farming empire
marketplace.powerUpsDescription: Boost your farming with exclusive items
marketplace.cosmeticsDescription: Decorate your farm with rare items
marketplace.hoarding.description: You must store your game progress in order to be able to purchase this listing.
marketplace.welcome.one: Howdy there, partner! Welcome to the Marketplace. Your one-stop shop for all things farm-tastic.
marketplace.welcome.two: Here you can trade resources, buy exclusive collectibles & boost your farm.
marketplace.welcome.three: The marketplace exclusively uses $FLOWER, the currency of Sunflower Land. You can earn $FLOWER in-game or trading with other players.
marketplace.welcome.four: Trade resources, collectibles & wearables for your farm.
marketplace.welcome.six: Earn points on trades and unlock rewards.
marketplace.welcome.seven: The marketplace items are intended for in-game use, not speculation or investment
marketplace.welcome.title: Welcome to the Marketplace
marketplace.quickswap.description: You are about to be redirected to Quickswap, a decentralized and community-driven exchange to buy $FLOWER.
marketplace.quickswap.warning: Prices shown in-game are estimated based on community prices & may not reflect the current market. Proceed at your own risk.
marketplace.tradeInitiated: Great news! It looks like someone is fulfilling your trade. Please wait for the trade to complete.

temperateSeason.introduction.two: Each season brings different opportunities. Certain crops can only grow in specific seasons. Keep an eye out for seasonal events that could affect your farm.
temperateSeason.introduction.three: Make sure to protect your crops and be prepared for anything!

cropGuide.payAttentionToSeason: Pay attention to the season. Certain produce can only be planted during a specific time.
cropGuide.earnCoins: To earn coins, you'll need to plant and harvest!
cropGuide.discoverExoticsDuringSpecialEv: Discover exotics during special events & at the potion house.
cropGuide.flower.description: Plant flowers to discover over 50+ unique varieties.
cropGuide.fruit.description: Fruit can only be planted in fruit patches. Each plant, can be harvested multiple times.
cropGuide.onlyInCropMachine: Seeds can only be planted in Crop Machine
cropGuide.tutorialAlwaysSpring: On your first island, it is always Spring! When you upgrade your island, the seasons will begin to change.

fullMoon.two: Betty has a supply of Duskberry, Lunara, and Celestine seeds.
fullMoon.three: The waters are filled with strange creatures.
description.duskberry: A rare berry that grows in the dark.
description.lunara: A rare berry that grows in the dark.

reputation.description: Increase your reputation to unlock more Web3 features!
reputation.points.title: Reputation - {{name}}
reputation.points.description: Earn reputation points by completing tasks.
reputation.marketplace.trades: Increase your reputation to unlock more trades.
reputation.guide.upgrade: Unlock all the expansions on your current island, and then click the goblin on the raft to reach the next island. (Basic -> Petal -> Desert -> Volcano)
reputation.guide.levelUp: To level up your Bumpkin, cook food in the cooking buildings, and click on the Bumpkin in front of the tent or house to feed it.
reputation.guide.connectDiscord: Connect your Discord account by clicking the gear icon, selecting General Settings, and clicking the Discord button.
reputation.guide.proofOfHumanity: Complete the Proof of Humanity by traveling to Retreat Island and locating the bank.
reputation.guide.ownBud: Own a Bud by purchasing it through the in-game or third-party marketplaces.
verify.verify: Verify your account to increase your reputation.
lavaPit.description: The lava pit turns resources into Obsidian. Requirements change each season.
whatsOn.seasonsArrived: Summer, Spring, Autumn and Winter have come to Sunflower Land!
whatsOn.volcanoIsland: Upgrade to Volcano Island, discover the Lava Pit and gather Obsidian!
whatsOn.ancientClocks: Ancient Clocks have appeared in the Desert!
whatsOn.solarForge: Visit Infernos Island and exchange your Sunstones at the Solar Forge!
whatsOn.weatherEvents: Watch our for special weather events and protect your crops!
whatsOn.timeshardsEarning: Complete chores, deliveries & bounties to earn Timeshards!
whatsOn.timeshardsUsage: Collect enough Timeshards to purchase NFTs at the Megastore and Auction House.
whatsOn.vipPass: Grab your VIP Pass for bonus Geniseeds and perks!
whatsOn.loveRushText: The Love Rush Event has begun! Join the festivities and earn FLOWER!
season.begun.description: {{name}} has begun in Sunflower Land. Check out this week's events.
solarForge.intro.greeting: Wow, I'm surprised you've made it this far!
solarForge.intro.gunter: I'm Gunter, the blacksmith of Infernos.
solarForge.intro.forge: I've been working on a new type of forge that can help you craft resources with the power of the sun.
solarForge.intro.forgeStrength: The strength of the forge is limited, each time you use it will require more Sunstones!
temperateSeason.possibleEventsDescriptio: Visit the weather shop in the plaza to protect your farm!
season.weatherShopDescription: Buy items to protect your farm from the weather
season.watchOutForSpecialEvents: Watch out for special events during each season!
season.protectYourFarm: You can purchase equipment to help you survive the weather.
season.weatherEventsCanLastUpTo24Hours: Weather events can last up to 24 hours.
season.welcomeToTheWeatherShop: Welcome to the Weather Shop! Here you can purchase equipment to help you survive special weather events.
season.PlaceProtectiveEquipment: To survive weather events, place protective equipment on the farm or inside the house just before the event occurs.
bounties.sfl.intro.one: I'm Gilda, the bounty hunter of Infernos.
bounties.sfl.intro.two: I heard you silly Bumpkins are selling your Obsidian for FLOWER. Is that true?
gorga.intro.two: I heard your kind has found some Obsidian. Is that true?

event.noticeboard.one: Welcome to the Festival of Colors 2025 Event!
event.noticeboard.two: In this island you can find a portal with a brand new minigame where you can earn Tokens to spend on special limited items! Your attempts in the portal  carry over days, so no rush to spend them all at once! Buy the unlimited attempts option to play at your leisure or to play as much as possible!
event.noticeboard.three: The shop uses a system similar to the Stella Shop, where you can unlock new items to buy after you buy items from the previous tiers. Also remember to buy as many event tickets as you can to have more chances to win $FLOWER!
event.noticeboard.four: Since the way the game and event works are always changing, there is no direct donate NPC this time, but you can buy any of the items on the shop with $FLOWER or buy attempts at the Portal to support and help us continue to bring bigger, better and more amazing events like this!
event.noticeboard.five: This is all thanks to you and your support! We from the community event team thank you all! Your feedback on the official Sunflower Land Discord Server is appreciated

petGuide.petEgg.title: Pet Egg
petGuide.petEgg.description3: Megastore: One per Chapter with chapter tickets.
petGuide.petEgg.description4: Crack an egg to unlock a new pet category you don't have. You get all seven categories before repeats.
petGuide.petEgg.description5: 21 common pets across 7 categories. Long-term collection goal.
petGuide.petEgg.description6: Common pets cannot be traded or transferred.
petGuide.title: Pet Guide
petGuide.description: Learn about pets and how to care for them.
petShop.title: Pet Shop
petGuide.feed.title: Feed
petGuide.feed.description: Common pets begin with 2 requests and unlock a 3rd at level 10. NFT pets start with 3, then unlock a 4th at level 30 and a 5th at level 200.
petGuide.feed.description2: Easy, medium, and hard meals give 20, 100, and 300 XP and Energy. Use harder meals before fetch runs for more energy.
petGuide.feed.description3: Gem reroll shuffles the menu. It costs 50 Gems and rises by 2x each time, resetting daily at 00:00 UTC.
petGuide.feed.description4: Daily requests reset at 00:00 UTC. Finish cooking in time to feed your pets when they reset.
petGuide.fetch.title: Fetch
petGuide.fetch.description: Spend energy to send pets on resource runs. Each unlock matches your pet's categories and levels.
petGuide.fetch.description2: See Level Perks for the full fetch unlock timeline by level.
petGuide.fetch.description3: Acorns (100 energy) are for shrine recipes. Category resources (200 energy) depend on your pet's categories.
petGuide.fetch.description4: Fossil Shells (300 energy) give random resources: Acorns, category resources, or rare Moonfur.
petGuide.fetch.description5: NFTs: Moonfur (1,000 energy), tertiary resource (200 energy).
petGuide.fetch.description6: Pets have 2 or 3 categories. Each category has its own fetch resource.
petGuide.nftTraits.title: NFT Traits
petGuide.nftTraits.description: NFT pets have unique traits that provide gameplay bonuses. Check your pet's traits in the pet management screen.
petGuide.nftTraits.description2: Aura (Energy Multiplier): No Aura 1Ã—, Common 1.5Ã—, Rare 2Ã—, Mythic 3Ã— energy gained per feed.
petGuide.nftTraits.description3: Bib (XP Bonus): Baby Bib +0, Collar +5, Gold Necklace +10 XP per feed.
petGuide.nftTraits.description4: Cosmetic Traits: Fur (various colors) and Accessories (Crown, Halo, Glasses, Bows, etc.) are purely cosmetic.
petGuide.nftTraits.description5: NFT Pet Types: Dragon, Ram, Phoenix, Griffin, Warthog, Wolf, Bear. Each has 3 categories (primary, secondary, tertiary).
petGuide.nftTraits.description6: NFT pets unlock Moonfur at Lv 12 and tertiary category resource at Lv 25.
petGuide.levelPerks.title: Level Perks
petGuide.levelPerks.description: As you level up your pet, you will unlock new perks that will help you in your journey.
petGuide.levelPerks.lvl50: +5% chance for extra fetch resource (15% total)
petGuide.levelPerks.lvl100: +10% chance for extra fetch resource (25% total)
petGuide.levelPerks.lvl150: +25% chance for extra Moonfur fetch resource (50% total) (NFT only)
petGuide.care.title: Care
petGuide.care.description: Common pets need feeding every 3 days, NFT pets every 7 days. Reviving a neglected pet costs 500 XP.
petGuide.care.description2: Pets nap 2 hours after a pat. Tap them while sleeping for +10 XP and to wake them up.
petGuide.care.description3: Only one of each NFT pet breed can be active. Inactive NFT pets can still be neglected.
petGuide.shrines.title: Shrines
petGuide.shrines.description: Every shrine blueprint uses pet resources. Shrines can be renewed once expired.
petGuide.social.title: Social
petGuide.social.description: Boost your pets by interacting with friends.
petGuide.social.description2: Friends can pet your companions for +5 XP each, up to 50 XP per pet per day.
petGuide.social.description3: NFT pets can walk with you in multiplayer areas. Enable this in the pet management screen. Only one pet can walk at a time.
petGuide.social.description4: Visit your friends farms to pet their pets and build community!
petGuide.petHouse.title: Pet House
petGuide.petHouse.description: Build a Pet House from the blacksmith to manage all your pets in one place.
petGuide.petHouse.description2: Place pets inside the Pet House to feed and fetch them there. Use landscaping mode when inside to arrange pets.
petGuide.petHouse.description3: Feed tab: Satisfy your pets' food requests. Use Bulk Feed to feed multiple pets at once.
petGuide.petHouse.description4: Fetch tab: Spend energy to send pets on resource runs for Acorns, category resources, and more.
petGuide.petHouse.description5: Pet All wakes napping pets. Cheer All revives neglected pets.
petGuide.petHouse.description6: Breed limits: Level 1 allows 3 breed of common pets and 1 NFT pet. Upgrades add +2 common pet breeds and +3 NFT capacity, up to 7 breeds and 7 NFT at level 3.
petGuide.petHouse.description7: Only one NFT pet of each type can be placed. Buds cannot be placed in the Pet House.
